import styles from './BurgerIngredients.module.css' import React from 'react' import {Tab} from "@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components" export default function BurgerIngredients({ data }) { const buns = data.filter(element => element.type === 'bun'); const main = data.filter( el => el.type == 'main' ); const sauce = data.filter( el => el.type == 'sauce' ); const [current, setCurrent] = React.useState('one') return (
